relationship_comment.value: x modifies y: A technique or agent x causes a digital object y to change; become different; or undertake a transformation.  Afterwards, the data or state held by a digital object is changed.

digital_artifact_comment.value: Computer software, or simply software, is that part of a computer system that consists of encoded information or computer instructions, in contrast to the physical hardware from which the system is built.
